summary:
Business Development, Sales, Real Estate, Hospitality , Financial Trading Services

Having an  Entrepreneurial mindset with a sharp eye for detail and deep analytical skills, comes a resourceful, creative and practical approach of how to “stand out” and make the difference. 

My work is who I am, driven with passion, determination, discipline and commitment to get the job done. 

Throughout my career, strong negotiation skills have helped me to achieve my goals. Being well travelled has helped me to feel comfortable with diversified cultures.
